text:
About 43,600 candidates would appear for the Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission’s examination for the recruitment of village administrative officers in the district on Sunday.

The examination would be held at 101 centres across the district. Collector K.S.Palanisamy said 150 chief invigilators have been nominated to supervise the exam.

Fifteen flying squads have been formed to conduct surprise inspections. About 33 mobile teams have been constituted to transport the question paper and answer sheets. Special buses would be operated to the examination centres, he said.
title: VAO examination
